review.comment: I was told by dispatch that the installer would have all the parts necessary to install a new 40 gal  electric hot water tank.The plumber showed up,looked at the old tank and went outside thinking that he went to his van to get his tools and parts for the job.I went outside to look for him and the van was gone.He did not say he was going somewhere.I find out through the grapevine that this company goes out shopping for the parts and charges $125 for the first hour and $98 for each additional hour.Your first hour is almost used up by the time he comes back from getting parts.I phoned and told dispatch to cancel the job because of this poor nonsense behavour!! I do not recommend this company because of this money GRAB.
review.review_reply:
We are very sorry about your experience. We try to carry on as much and as many different parts as possible on our vans but sometimes we need to get parts for the job specifically.
Kind regards,

review.comment: Janos is the Picasso of plumbing. He re-did my entire house plumbing all the while a severe rain storm was taking place he and his assistant never stopped working. I bought a complex claw foot bath tub but for Janos no problem. He worked hard at making my vision of a Europe style bathroom come to life. Thank you Janos and yes I highly recommend John G Plumbing.
review.review_reply:
We are grateful, that you took the time to leave us this beautiful 5 star review.
Our company put customer satisfaction as top priority and we believe that the most important service is to provide satisfaction.

We count ourselves lucky for customers like you. If you need anything in the future, please let us know and we would be happy to help again.

review.comment: 5 stars for showing up and actually working ...I accidently put a nail into my water pipe when gyprocking and they immediately sent someone to fix it ...I'm remodelling the entire house and John G is doing all the plumbing...

review.comment: I can't say enough good things about John G! He was responsive, came on time, was a delight to have around for a few days as he replaced all the Poly B in our house.  The work was well done and he is an excellent communicator, teaching as he goes, recognizing problems that we hadn't seen and coming up with inexpensive solutions.  I hope his business thrives!

review.comment: We had an issue with our toilet.  It was not an emergency but John G. came as soon as he could.  Much to my relief, he knew right away what the problem was and fixed it in no time and did a great job.  I would recommend his services with no hesitation.  Besides being competent, he was very pleasant and friendly.  Thank you, John!
review.review_reply:
Thank You for your 5STAR Review Baiba!
Your feedback is very important to us. We are glad that we could help resolve the toilet issue. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future.

review.comment:
I recently used John G Plumbing to install a kitchen sink. I had used him previously to install a sink and vanity in my bathroom. John was able to fit me in quite promptly. Also, the countertop had not been cut out for the sink to be installed and, when I informed him of this, he said he could do that no problem.
Upon attempting to install the sink he noticed the sink was damaged and also wasn't lying flush on the countertop, so that day I returned the sink and got a new one, and John was able to make the time to come back and finish the install the same day.
John and his apprentice were prompt, friendly, professional, funny and helpful. I have used him twice now and would not hesitate to recommend him to anyone needing a plumber. I highly recommend John G Plumbing. :)
review.review_reply: Thank you for your 5 Star Review Tanis! We’re glad we were able to help. We greatly appreciate your support.

review.comment: We required a cartridge to replace a broken one in our shower.  After numerous calls to plumbers in Nanaimo, Parksville and area,  where no one was interested in assisting us (we live in Nanoose Bay) - not only did John G Plumbing (Gabriella) offer to track one down, she ordered it and had it delivered directly to our home.  She tracked the order then phoned us to make an appointment for John to install it.  We give them 5 Stars for all the service and excellent work.  THANK YOU.
review.review_reply: Thank you Vivian for sharing your experience. We’re glad we were able to help. We greatly appreciate your support. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you. If you need anything in the future, please let us know and we would be happy to help again.

review.comment: John got us out of 'hot water'! (...wife does NOT think I'm funny...) Our hot water tank decided to end it's own life and started leaking out of areas that it should not have. Suffice to say it's innards cooled and my floor became a miniature indoor pool. 5 hours later after calling John we had hot water again, our 'pool' was drained and the old tank retired to a "better" place. I know he made quick decisive action and adjustments to his busy schedule and with modest professionalism saved the day. My wife and I had a stress filled morning that was quickly rectified. I wish all services ordered went as smooth as this. If you read this John, thanks again. I will DEFINITELY call in the future if I need too.

review.comment: I can't thank you enough, John for helping me when my hotwater tank had to be replaced. I am so glad I got a second quote. You were here longer than planned and could have charged me more but you stuck to your original quote. Will highly recommend you to everyone I know.

review.comment:

So called John based on Google reviews and let me say people are not wrong. John went the extra mile to get a spout for a 3/4 inch pipe and came back and did the work so quickly I was very impressed. Great job very friendly, knowledgeable and neat. Will gladly recommended.
Thanks again really appreciate it.
